name: @mariozechner/pi-video-electron
description: Electron wrapper and video-agent runtime for pi, backed by VotGO CLI tools

scripts.build: tsgo -p tsconfig.build.json && mkdir -p dist/renderer && cp -r renderer/. dist/renderer/ && cp src/preload.cjs dist/preload.cjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Mario Zechner
